title: 41: Bipolar Disorder & Mental Health Awareness (ft. Okay Sis)
itunes:title: 41: Bipolar Disorder & Mental Health Awareness (ft. Okay Sis)
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: mental illness and self harm is discussed) The Broads sit down and chat with the IRL sisters from Okay Sis podcast. Jess and Scout discuses their battles with mental illness. Bekah and Mady share their experiences being in the lives of those struggling with mental illness. They chat bipolar disorder, anxiety, self care, therapy, medication, and more. 
Check out Scout and Mady at @okaysispodcast! 
Learn how to become a volunteer Crisis Counselor for the Crisis Text Line here: https://www.crisistextline.org/volunteer
Chatty Broads is recorded and produced at @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com (http://www.theblueroommedia.com/)
***BRUMATE: Visit brumate.com (http://brumate.com/) and add code CHATTY to get 15% off your first order!
***CLUTTER: Get $50 off your first month when you sign up at CLUTTER.COM/CHATTY (http://clutter.com/CHATTY) and enter promo code CHATTY!
***TALKSPACE: Go to talkspace.com (http://talkspace.com/) and enter code CHATTY to get your first week free!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
